Music Performance (Secondary): Preparatory Skills. Preparatory training in fundamentals of music theory and aural skills. For BMUS students only, and only as required by School of Music admission procedures. Contact the School of Music Student Advisor for more information.
courseName: Introduction to the Theory of Music
description: Concepts of rhythm, pitch, timbre, and texture. Notation and aural recognition of rhythmic and pitch patterns. Basic principles of melody and form. This course is not applicable to the B.Mus.
